name: ems-web-app-breakpoint-detection
author: Chris Spence (https://educationalmediasolutions.com)
description: This angular.io module includes a service and component to detect when an application's viewport crosses a breakpoint (e.g., from phone portrait to phone landscape)

scripts.publish: git add -A . && git commit -m 'prepublish npm package' && npm version patch && ng build breakpoint && cd dist && npm publish
